text_summary: Viz.ai LVO is an AI-powered stroke triage platform that analyzes CT angiography to detect large vessel occlusions and automatically alerts the neurointerventional team, reducing time to treatment.
intended_use: Computer-aided triage of suspected large vessel occlusion stroke on CTA images to notify the neurovascular specialist.
performance_summary: Sensitivity 97.5%, specificity 94.0% for LVO detection. Median time savings of 52 minutes for transfer-to-groin-puncture.

text_summary: Aidoc BriefCase for intracranial hemorrhage uses deep learning to prioritize CT head studies with suspected acute intracranial hemorrhage in the radiology worklist.
intended_use: AI-based triage and notification for acute intracranial hemorrhage on non-contrast CT head studies.
performance_summary: Sensitivity 95.0%, specificity 94.0% for ICH detection across 12,000 validation cases. Sub-10 second processing time.

text_summary: Caption Health Caption AI uses AI guidance to assist non-expert users in acquiring diagnostic-quality cardiac ultrasound images, enabling point-of-care echocardiography.
intended_use: AI-guided cardiac ultrasound acquisition to assist non-specialist users in obtaining standard echocardiographic views with automated ejection fraction assessment.
performance_summary: 93% of AI-guided studies deemed diagnostic quality by cardiologists. Automated EF measurement within 5% of expert consensus.

text_summary: Lunit INSIGHT CXR analyzes chest X-rays to detect and localize 10 major radiologic findings including nodules, consolidation, pneumothorax, and cardiomegaly.
intended_use: Detection of 10 chest radiograph abnormalities including nodules, consolidation, pneumothorax, pleural effusion, and cardiomegaly as a concurrent reader aid.
performance_summary: AUC 0.977 for abnormality detection across 10 findings. Nodule detection sensitivity 95.2% at specificity 90.1%.

text_summary: Qure.ai qXR is an AI solution for automated interpretation of chest X-rays capable of detecting tuberculosis, nodules, and 15 other thoracic abnormalities.
intended_use: Automated detection and localization of chest X-ray abnormalities including tuberculosis, nodules, pneumothorax, and pleural effusion.
performance_summary: TB detection sensitivity 98.5%, specificity 95.3%. AUC 0.96 for overall abnormality detection in multi-site validation.

text_summary: Zebra Medical Bone Health uses deep learning to opportunistically screen for osteoporosis from routine CT scans by measuring vertebral body attenuation.
intended_use: Opportunistic screening for osteoporosis by analyzing vertebral body bone density on routine CT examinations.
performance_summary: AUC 0.927 for osteoporosis detection compared to DEXA gold standard. Automated T-score estimation correlation r=0.88.

text_summary: HeartFlow FFR-CT is a cloud-based deep learning platform that computes fractional flow reserve from coronary CT angiography without the need for invasive catheterization.
intended_use: Non-invasive computation of fractional flow reserve from coronary CTA data to assess physiological significance of coronary artery stenosis.
performance_summary: Per-vessel sensitivity 86%, specificity 79% vs invasive FFR. Reduces unnecessary catheterizations by 61% in PLATFORM trial.

text_summary: IDx-DR is the first FDA-authorized fully autonomous AI diagnostic system that detects diabetic retinopathy from retinal fundus images without physician interpretation.
intended_use: Autonomous detection of more-than-mild diabetic retinopathy and diabetic macular edema from retinal fundus photographs in primary care settings.
performance_summary: Sensitivity 87.2%, specificity 90.7% for more-than-mild DR in pivotal trial of 900 patients across 10 primary care sites.

text_summary: Paige Prostate is the first AI-based pathology product to receive FDA de novo authorization, detecting cancerous tissue in digitized prostate biopsy slides.
intended_use: Detection of areas of interest on digitized prostate needle core biopsy whole slide images to identify potential cancerous tissue for pathologist review.
performance_summary: Sensitivity 97.7% for cancer detection. Improved pathologist sensitivity from 89.3% to 96.5% when used as a concurrent aid.

text_summary: Arterys Cardio AI provides automated cardiac MRI analysis with AI-powered segmentation of cardiac chambers and automated calculation of ejection fraction and volumes.
intended_use: Automated segmentation of cardiac chambers and quantification of ventricular function from cardiac MRI cine images.
performance_summary: EF correlation r=0.97 with manual expert measurement. Automated analysis in under 15 seconds vs 30 minutes manual.

text_summary: RapidAI stroke platform provides automated CT perfusion analysis with ischemic core and penumbra quantification for thrombectomy patient selection in acute stroke.
intended_use: Automated CT perfusion analysis for identification of ischemic core and salvageable penumbra to support acute stroke treatment decisions.
performance_summary: Core volume correlation r=0.92 with DWI-MRI ground truth. ASPECTS agreement kappa 0.78 with neuroradiology consensus.

text_summary: Tempus ECG-AF algorithm detects atrial fibrillation from standard 12-lead ECGs even during normal sinus rhythm, enabling early detection of paroxysmal AF.
intended_use: Detection of atrial fibrillation from 12-lead ECG recordings, including identification of patients with paroxysmal AF during sinus rhythm.
performance_summary: AUC 0.93 for AF detection from sinus rhythm ECG. Sensitivity 82%, specificity 88% in validation cohort of 45,000 ECGs.

text_summary: GE Healthcare AIR Recon DL uses deep learning-based MRI reconstruction to improve image quality while reducing scan times by up to 50% across musculoskeletal, neuro, and body MRI.
intended_use: Deep learning-based MRI image reconstruction to reduce noise and improve SNR, enabling scan time reduction while maintaining diagnostic image quality.
performance_summary: 2-3x SNR improvement over conventional reconstruction. Up to 50% scan time reduction with maintained diagnostic quality per multi-reader study.

text_summary: Siemens AI-Rad Companion provides automated organ segmentation, measurement, and quantification across CT chest, abdomen, and cardiovascular studies.
intended_use: Automated organ segmentation and quantitative analysis on CT studies including cardiac chamber volumes, coronary calcium scoring, and lung analysis.
performance_summary: Organ segmentation Dice 0.93-0.97 across 8 thoracic structures. Automated analysis time under 60 seconds on edge deployment.

text_summary: iCAD ProFound AI provides AI-powered detection and density assessment for digital breast tomosynthesis and 2D mammography to improve breast cancer screening accuracy.
intended_use: AI-based detection of malignant soft tissue densities and calcifications on digital breast tomosynthesis and 2D mammography images.
performance_summary: Cancer detection sensitivity 93% at 50% fewer false positives. Reduces reading time by 52.7% in reader study. AUC 0.96 for malignancy.
